overview: Billionare recluse Baxter McKay has a lot on his mind lately... Blondes, Brunettes, Reheads with long tanned legs, firm breasts and tight little buns... He's out of control these fantasies are taking over his mind not to mention his zipper... What's a guy to do? Throw a wall to wall costume bash and invite the wildest, hottest babes in town. Have everyone in costume so no one will know who's doing what to whom...  The possibilities are endless... Grab you noisemaker and join us for an affair you'll never forget... There's certain to be plenty to eat... So plan to be up all night... It's gonna be a ball... Buster.
title: Masquerade
